entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon except high plus 5 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon except high plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4 except minus 8 over the Highlands. POP 30%
